data.eml:eml: Biology and morphology of immature stages of Lixus canescens (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Lixinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Skuhrovec, Jiří, Volovnik, Semyon (2015): Biology and morphology of immature stages of Lixus canescens (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Lixinae). Zootaxa 4033 (3): 350-362, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4033.3.2
